Topic: Draw a fish in their habitat with labels.
Evidence Statements: The student can draw a picture of a fish in its natural habitat, such as a lake, river, pond, or ocean.
The student can label the fish and any other plants or animals that live in the same habitat.
The student can identify and label the resources the fish needs to survive, like water and food.
The student can show relationships in the drawing, such as how the fish interacts with its environment (e.g., fish swims in water).
